meanings.sent1: The unwarned hikers were surprised by the sudden storm.
meanings.sent2: The unwarned driver didn't expect the road closure.
meanings.sent3: The unwarned puppy happily chewed on the unexpected treat.
meanings.sent4: The unwarned students were like deer caught in headlights during the surprise quiz.
meanings.sent5: The unwarned guests were left out in the cold without jackets.

meanings.sent1: The unwarned passengers were confused when the flight was canceled.
meanings.sent2: The unwarned shoppers were caught off guard by the sudden sale.
meanings.sent3: The unwarned cat pounced on the toy mouse, thinking it was real.
meanings.sent4: The unwarned employees felt lost when the meeting was rescheduled without notice.
meanings.sent5: The unwarned residents were startled by the loud noise in the middle of the night.
